thread.title: How the financial crisis lit the weed industry on fire

title: How the financial crisis lit the weed industry on fire
text:
How the financial crisis lit the weed industry on fire Tuesday, March 20, 2018 - 02:06 
As the financial crisis roared 10 years ago, fired or weary bankers looking for work found smoking-hot opportunities as the legal marijuana business began to take off.   
As the financial crisis roared 10 years ago, fired or weary bankers looking for work found smoking-hot opportunities as the legal marijuana business began to take off.  //reut.rs/2IDIbm6
